comment: Easily one of the best teachers I have had period. Very easy grader. You don't even have to show up for class, just make sure to complete online assignments. She will help your grade out if you show her that you care about her class. Aside from teaching, she is very easy to talk to and understanding of personal issues.

She is an amazing professor! She is very caring and as long as you do the work you get an easy A. The class was one I was not looking forward too but she made it worthwhile. If you have a tight schedule she will work with you in every way possible. I loved her I would take her again if she taught anything else.

I LOVE HER!! She is amazing and really on your side! She tries to help you out in any way she can! Even if its another class! Always going to help you out when you need it and very understanding! My favorite professor by far at KSU.

I LOVE BEARDEN! She has been my favorite professor so far. Easy class and she's beyond caring and understanding. I turned in a few things late and she didn't dock! You have a few projects at the same time but they're relatively easy. Quizzes are easy and she gave all the answers to the midterm! She also randomly gives extra credit. She's amazing!!!

TAKE THIS CLASS. If you are a freshman coming out of high school this is the class for you. Prof Bearden was by far my favorite prof this year, & I enjoyed her class even more! She understands young people so well & always made me feel like I had a voice. Midterm is cheddar, the occasional R&R, a few group projects, and you got yourself an A.

I had Bearden as my freshman seminar instructor and she was absolutely amazing. I feel like it's because she's so young and fresh out of college that she understands how much energy school sucks out of you. She is a lenient grader and definitely cares for her student's well being. Yes, she assigns readings but they're well worth the time
Very great professor and easy to get along with. She gets to know her students and is a fairly easy class.

I loved Ms. Bearden! She was a great professor and I would take her again if I could. She was very understand and has a true passion for teaching. She will work with you if you need help and does not want to see people fail!She always made class interesting, and it's a smaller class so you get to know everyone really well. Loved this class!! 10/10

If you are looking at this, TAKE THIS CLASS!!!!! I'm only a freshman but I for sure know Ms. Bearden will be one of the best professors I've ever had. She is not just a teacher, she's also a friend who cares so much about her students. Her class is never boring and she is all around a great person. If you can take her for any subject TAKE HER!! :)
